info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:51AM CDT until August 02 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SANGAMON COUNTY... At 251 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Williamsville, or 11 miles northeast of Springfield, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Riverton, Spaulding and Dawson. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 110 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
